author: Vandana Rambaran
title: Massachusetts seen as a new coronavirus hot spot as cases surge
description: Cases of coronavirus surged in Massachusetts, creating a new hotspot for the virus, as officials scramble to beef up hospital capacities for the influx of positive cases.
content:
